name: Dark Man
description:
Romance and street gangs, corporations that rule the world.

Which side will you take?
Become a big boss, or put together your gang?
Or maybe, well, her, this love ... But who is she to save her ...

Just now...

No one and nothing will help you when faced with danger face to face!

=========================

At this stage in the development of the game, RAT! Has made itself felt!

Crowds of robots are waiting for you!

=========================

Why do you see everything in this light?

Who are you, who are they?

Why is your body beyond your control and difficult to control?

=========================

Search for answers or go with the flow?

=========================

Everything that you were looking for, you will find beyond ... worlds ...

=========================

But where is she, this line?

=========================

To cross the line, it’s so simple ... to know only where it lies ...
